prompt: Create a professional 'Contact Us' page with a clean white background and a modern, minimalist design. Display a centered 'Contact Us' title in bold black (Color(0xFF000000)) with a font size of 36, followed by a subtitle in grey (Color(0xFF616161)) explaining how to reach out. Present three contact methods (Phone: +1 234 567 8900, Email: support@company.com, Address: 456 Main St, City, Country) in vertically stacked cards with a white background, subtle shadow (elevation 4), and rounded corners (radius 8). Each card includes an icon (phone, email, location) in teal (Color(0xFF009688)) on the left, with text aligned to the right. Below, include a contact form with fields for Name, Email, Subject, and Message, using outlined text fields with teal borders. Add a teal 'Submit' button with white text, spanning the full width. Use padding of EdgeInsets.all(20) for the main body and 16 pixels vertical spacing between elements. Ensure a clean, professional look with a Column layout.
